app_name: Groups Treatment Groups Apple Translate Dialog Translate Speech
app_description: Enjoy the easiest speech and text translator app on the App Store! Translating has never been so easy. Select languages tap the button get the translation that s it. Everything is done within one screen! TRANSLATOR THAT ALLOWS YOU TO: Communicate in over 100 languages with voice to voice translations Read write with easy to use text translations Learn words phrases in over 100 different languages Communicate with ease everywhere you go Make accurate speech text translations in real time FEATURES: CAMERA TRANSLATOR Use your camera to instantly translate signs menus or any other printed text. KEYBOARD FOR MESSAGING Chat with friends via messenger or email using a keyboard with built in translator. TRAVEL HUB Find helpful tools to plan your next trip: Listen to travel language podcasts. Use the currency converter to access over 150 exchange rates. APPLE WATCH APP Instantly translate over 100 languages straight from your wrist. Subscribe to Dialog Plus to unlock unlimited voice text translations for Apple Watch. OFFLINE MODE In offline mode you can translate texts without Internet connection. HOME SCREEN WIDGET Quickly access Dialog in a single tap right from your home screen. SIMPLE EASY Tap the button and speak. Just stop speaking to hear back the translation. ADVANCED SPEECH RECOGNITION Works well in noisy environments such as streets stations and other crowded places. LANGUAGE DETECTION The language is automatically translated as you speak between the selected languages. SURPRISING VELOCITY Translations delivered in real time. EXCELLENT ACCURACY Uses the best translation engine available today. 100 LANGUAGES Translates speech and text instantly between more than 100 languages. Get the app and start one tap translations right away! Supported languages and dialects: Arabic Saudi Arabia United Arab Emirates Afrikaans South Africa Amharic Ethiopia Armenian Azerbaijani Bengali Bangladesh India Basque Spain Bulgarian Catalan Chinese Cantonese Mandarin Taiwan Croatian Czech Danish Dutch The Netherlands English Australian Canada India UK US Finnish Filipino Philippines French French Canada Galician German Greek Georgian Gujarati India Hebrew Hungarian Icelandic Indonesian Italian Japanese Javanese Indonesia Korean Khmer Cambodia Malay Moldavian Norwegian Nepali Nepal Polish Portuguese Portuguese Brazil Lao Laos Latvian Lithuanian Romanian Russian Slovak Slovenian Spanish Spanish Mexican Swahili Kenya Serbian Swedish Sinhala Sri Lanka Thai Turkish Ukranian Urdu Pakistan Vietnamese Zulu South Africa . Google Translate is utilized to power Dialog s translations. The app contains the following subscription options: Weekly subscription Subscription automatically renews unless auto renew is turned off at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. The cost of renewal is equal to the value that Apple s App Store Matrix determines as the equivalent of the subscription price in USD. Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period if offered will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto renewal may be turned off by going to the user s Account Settings after purchase. Privacy Policy: https: maplemedia.io privacy Terms of Service: https: maplemedia.io terms of service Support: contact maplemedia.io
